```{scm include=FALSE}
(load "./little.scm")
```

関数`keep-looking`

```{scm results=FALSE}
(define keep-looking
  (lambda (a sorn lat)
    (cond
     ((number? sorn)
      (keep-looking a (pick sorn lat) lat))
     (else (eq? sorn a)))))
```

関数`looking`

```{scm results=FALSE}
(define looking
  (lambda (a lat)
    (keep-looking a (pick 1 lat) lat)))
```

```{scm}
(looking 'caviar '(6 2 4 caviar 5 7 3))
```

```{scm}
(looking 'caviar '(6 2 grits caviar 5 7 3))
```
